## Header with no number {-}

```{r nice-tab, eval = FALSE}
knitr::kable(
  head(iris, 10), caption = 'Here is a nice kable!',
  booktabs = TRUE
)
```

Here is a `fpr_kable` with a cross reference to Table \@ref(tab:fpr-kable-nr)

```{r fpr-kable-nr, eval = T}
head(iris, 20) %>% 
  fpr::fpr_kable(
  caption_text = 'Here is a fpr_kable with no cross-ref and the scroll set to not happen when pdf built.',
  scroll = gitbook_on)
```
